title: France panorama. [No. 72/42]
creator_credit: Societe d'informations Cinematographiques and Pathé Frères
brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. French politics - President Pompidou’s press conference. 2. Air for city-dwellers - the Vincennes Floral Park. 3. Francois Billetdoux - portrait of a writer. 4. Regional equipment: Corsica - the island’s industrial and agricultural development.
